I'll have to do this live tweet in 3 parts... there is just too much Sword & Sorcery crapulence for one sitting
#ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
This is kind of the Batman Returns of Conan movies where the title character isn't actually in it that much #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet

Arnold just said "INTO DA BOAT" as a call to action

This is just too entertaining

#ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
The pterodactyl takes the whiny princess into his tower CONAN MUST SAVE HER #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Dollar Store Wizard polymorphs into a pterodactyl #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet https://t.co/mXSJ5NsELX
Conan & party arrive at the tower and must now face DOLLAR STORE WIZARD #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet https://t.co/vzb5Wgsmd8
Grace Jones hits a guy with a moustache in the groin with a staff LEAVE MOVEMBER ALONE #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Conan grabs the heads of two soldiers and smashes them together knocking them out NEVER SEEN THAT BEFORE #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
At the behest of the whiny princess, Conan frees Grace Jones from a public gladiatorial display #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet

Conan recruits a wizard by saying "I need you" who replies "I'm yours"

Not making any of this up

#ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
@timmalstead Noooot cool Arnold
Then Conan graphically decapitates a guy but the other kills are about as damaging as Nerf swords #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Conan happens to see a wizard friend of his captured and being roasted over a spit #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Whiny princess starts talking to Wilt Chamberlain about whether or not Conan is attractive #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Ha yeah, good luck with that Wilt Chamberlain #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Wilt Chamerlain is also ordered to MURDER CONAN AND JAR JAR once they've met the wizard and returned #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
But it turns out she is to be sacrificed after anyway and Wilt Chamberlain has to make sure she stays a virgin #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Arnold has to escort a whiny 12 year old princess to meet a wizard #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet

CONAN YOU BLEW UP HALF A CITY BLOCK TODAY Meet your new partners Grace Jones, Wilt Chamberlain, & a 12 year old
#ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
@MikeLeSauvage He did! They had to increase the camel brutality for the sequel I guess.

Then Conan BEATS THE CRAP OUT THE CAMEL WITH HIS FISTS 
#ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Conan APOLOGIZES to the camel but the camel just spits a bunch of camel goo at Conan  #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet https://t.co/6c1JLYyvQL
Conan & Jar Jar ride through a city triumphant, then they talk about the camel Conan punched in the 1st movie #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Then a witch promises to return Conan's dead girlfriend to life in exchange for running an errand for her #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
Conan and Jar Jar steal some stuff from some people, they come back to get it back, Conan MURDERS most of them #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
This movie has a comic relief sidekick, it has a Jar Jar #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet

Conan just introduced a guy to Mr. Sword and caused MUCH BLOOD... got away with quite a bit for PG
#ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet

Arnold is in frigging great shape in this movie, better than the last movie #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet

And there he is, the single greatest actor of all time:

Pretty rad intro, narration over barren landscape "Let me tell you of the days of high adventure" #ConanTheDestroyerLiveTweet
